intension: Design a colorful and eye-catching Facebook cover that showcases the vibrant and diverse architecture of different cities. The text 'Top Healthiest, Built Cities' may imply that the cover is promoting healthy and livable cities.
globalcaption: The image features a cityscape with a large building in the background. The building is adorned with statues, giving it a majestic appearance. The city is surrounded by a lush green park, providing a contrast between the urban environment and the natural landscape. The scene is further enhanced by the presence of trees and bushes, adding to the overall beauty of the city.
keywords: architecture, buildings, city, destination, facade, houses, journey, site, street, tour, town, travelling, trip, voyage, colors, colorful, facebook, cover, fb, travel, frame

bglayer.bgcaption: The image is a white and blue geometric shape, possibly a triangle or a square, with a green stripe running through the center. The green stripe is positioned horizontally, creating a visually appealing design. The white and blue colors are interspersed with the green stripe, creating a harmonious and balanced composition

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a cityscape with a large statue prominently displayed in the foreground. The statue is positioned in front of a building, which appears to be a church. The cityscape also includes a clock tower, adding to the architectural diversity of the scene. The overall atmosphere of the image is one of urban life and cultural heritage
